translations: 有合理限度地，适中地；一般地，勉强地

sentences.sentence: Their retinal cells are also not excessively sensitive to red components of moderately bright light.
sentences.translation: 它们的视网膜细胞对中等亮度光线中的红色成分也不太敏感。

sentences.sentence: The new measure will specify to moderately relax the quota of the self-produced products of foreign-invested enterprise for the domestic market.
sentences.translation: 新办法将明确适度放宽外商投资企业自产产品在国内市场的配额。

sentences.sentence: The new measure will specify to moderately relax the quota of the self-produced products of foreign-invested enterprises for the domestic market.
sentences.translation: 新办法将明确适度放宽外商投资企业自产产品在国内市场的配额。
